Class SpriteLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.prog_assgmnt_team.SpriteLoader

  • public class SpriteLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    This Class Loads sprite in to graphics and stores them to be used when drawn to the screen

      • getSprite

        public Sprite getSprite(java.lang.String fileName,
               int x,
               int y,
               int width,
               int height)
        loads sprite to graphics and then stores sprite sheet in sourceImageStorage and the sprite to be drawn in sprites.
        Parameters:
        fileName - the name of the file.
        x - Location of the X coordinate.
        y - Location of the Y coordinate.
        width - The sprites width.
        height - The sprites height.
        Returns:
        Sprite that can be drawn
